body:
Hello,

With the slow progression of Trello, maps haven't been checked as often due to the inactivity. We will be changing back to the old system where we accept/deny maps on the forums. Hopefully this will be more efficient for us and maps will be more noticeable. Of course, you can still submit maps to Trello, but I can't guarantee that it will be checked immediately.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask below.

title: Old System [Accepting/Denying Maps]
